solution_line_template: The grape jar had {banana_candy_pieces}+{grape_more_than_banana} = <<{banana_candy_pieces}+{grape_more_than_banana}={grape_candy_pieces}>>{grape_candy_pieces} pieces of candy.
The peanut butter jar had {grape_candy_pieces}*{pb_times_grape} = <<{grape_candy_pieces}*{pb_times_grape}={peanut_butter_candy_pieces}>>{peanut_butter_candy_pieces} pieces of candy.
